scenario.sendRequestSIP:
INVITE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[HardAddressUAS]> From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[InviteBranchId] Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, PRACK Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Content-Length: x
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=[clientName] 999 999 IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] s=- c=IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] t=0 0 m=audio [clientRtpPort] RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application clientRtcpPort udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/resource-lists+xml Content-Disposition: recipient-list
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <resource-lists xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:resource-lists" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <list> <entry uri="[InviteeName]"/> </list> </resource-lists> ------=_Part_0--

PRACK sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[PrackBranchID] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [PrackCseqNumber] PRACK Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Content-Length: x

UPDATE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[PrackBranchID] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [PrackCseqNumber] UPDATE Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Content-Length: x
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=[clientName] 999 999 IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] s=- c=IN IP4 [LocalAddressUAC] t=0 0 m=audio [clientRtpPort] RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application clientRtcpPort udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/resource-lists+xml Content-Disposition: recipient-list
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <resource-lists xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:resource-lists" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <list> <entry uri="[InviteeName]"/> </list> </resource-lists> ------=_Part_0--

PRACK sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[Prack2BranchID] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [Prack2CseqNumber] PRACK Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Content-Length: x

ACK sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[AckBranchId] Contact: "[InviterName]"<sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: [UserAgent] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, NOTIFY Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [ByeCseqNumber] BYE Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]"<sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[ByeBranchId] User-Agent: [UserAgent] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
